Direct Known Subclasses:
ListIPTest, NewScalarIPTest, ScalarMapperTest
public class ScalarIPTest<P extends ScalarIP> extends BaseIPTest<P>
Full tests for easy version of Iterative parallelism homework for Java Advanced course.
Author:
Georgiy Korneev (kgeorgiy@kgeorgiy.info)
